description: Wicket Guest Checkout - Secure guest payment system for WooCommerce
name: industrialdev/wicket-wp-guest-checkout

scripts.production: [ -x vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer ] || composer install && composer cs:fix && rm -rf vendor && composer update --no-dev && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader
scripts.setup-hooks: mkdir -p .git/hooks && cp .ci/pre-push .git/hooks/pre-push && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-push && echo 'Git hooks installed to .git/hooks/pre-push'
scripts.test:browser: sh -lc 'if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; : "${WICKET_BROWSER_BASE_URL:=https://localhost}"; export WICKET_BROWSER_BASE_URL; ./vendor/bin/pest --testsuite browser'

scripts-descriptions.cs:fix: Run PHP CS Fixer to fix coding standards issues
scripts-descriptions.test:coverage: Run Pest tests with HTML coverage report
scripts-descriptions.test:browser: Run Pest browser tests against https://localhost
